text: College Pond is a natural kettlehole pond in Plymouth, Massachusetts, located in the Myles Standish State Forest northeast of East Head Reservoir, Three Cornered Pond, New Long Pond and Barrett Pond, and north of Fearing Pond. There is a swimming beach and picnic area along the north shore of the pond. College Pond may be named after a series, or collection, of nearby ponds. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Ponds of Plymouth, Massachusetts Category:Ponds of Massachusetts
title: College Pond
